                                              throws java.io.IOException
        Combine two bitmap (in byte array format) in same byte array
        Parameters:
        baseImage - base byte array bitmap
        overlayImage - overlay byte array bitmap
        config - output configuration
        compressFormat - compress format for final image
        Returns:
        combined byte array
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the file cannot be created
